metadata.title: CVE-2022-31253 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A Untrusted Search Path vulnerability in openldap2 of openSUSE Factoryallows local attackers with control of the ldap user or group to changeownership of arbitrary directory entries to this user/group, leading toescalation to root. This issue affects: openSUSE Factory openldap2 versionsprior to 2.6.3-404.1.

criterions.comment: openldap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
